channel.title: [Help] Please... Help me! I need help forwarding ports I have two comps
channel.description:
OK, I have two computers I usually don't use the main computer in my house another person does, I am trying to host it off of the computer I have in my room how do I do this? I get everything from the main computer, routers, internet all of it...You name it.
I have constently tried to get this working and set-up a server, but I cannot if you can help me...I will give you 500k rs cash and head mod (gold crown) on my new server...I have everything source and all that shit, someone please help... How do I do it? I already have no-ip account.

item.title: [Help] Please... Help me! I need help forwarding ports I have two comps
item.dc:creator: @masterp00n masterp00n
item.description:
@masterp00n wrote:

Tell me your router type and model and ill help ya out

Read full topic

item.title: [Help] Please... Help me! I need help forwarding ports I have two comps
item.dc:creator: @Joseph1 Joseph_
item.description:
@Joseph1 wrote:

If you can’t access your router, Hamachi is the easier solution as you need just need for people to connect to your Ham IP.

P.S. Don’t post “Bump”

Read full topic
